title: Matchsafe
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Figure of woman with left hand up to chin. Figure wears a dress with blue skirt covered with rust rings and white top with blue dots. Figure has mustard colored hair and holds an orange handbag.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe.
Porcelain. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1982-23-306.
